2015-1540 (La. 9/16/16)

STATE EX REL. Booker Earl LOYDEN v. STATE of Louisiana NO. 2015-KH-1540 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 16, 2016

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Rapides, 9th Judicial District Court Div. C, No. 256385; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. KH 15-00365

h Denied. State ex rel. Bernard v. Cr. D.C., 94-2247 (La. 4/28/95), 653 So.2d 1174.
